personal_info.name: Pablo Matias Lescano
personal_info.title: Senior Software Engineer | Tech Lead (Cloud & Data)

summary: Senior Software Engineer and Tech Lead with +{{years}} years of experience evolving enterprise architectures towards modern Cloud & Data solutions on AWS. Expert in DDD, CQRS, and Medallion architectures.

experience.role: Tech Lead (Data & Cloud) / Senior Full Stack Engineer
metrics: Technical Leadership of a distributed squad of 4 developers, establishing engineering standards (Code Reviews, GitFlow) that accelerated the Data team's delivery speed.
Cloud Data Architecture (AWS): Design and implementation of a Serverless solution (Lambda, EventBridge, S3) under Medallion pattern, orchestrating ingestion of +95 critical data sources.
Performance Engineering: Massive 95% optimization in response times for analytical reports on volumes of +6.8M records using advanced partitioning and tuning strategies in PostgreSQL.
experience.description: Led the design of a comprehensive data platform and the development of critical components for booking engines (Plus Ultra, Jambojet).

metrics: Technical Leadership & Culture: Active mentorship of 4 developers and raising standards through strict Code Reviews.
Mission-Critical Scalability: Implementation of asynchronous CQRS patterns with MediatR to manage high-concurrency booking flows for global airline engines (SunExpress).
Strategic Modernization: Leadership in decoupling legacy systems towards a modular Angular SPA architecture, facilitating white-label theming and reducing deployment time for new clients.
experience.description: Specialized in White Label Booking Engines for airlines like SunExpress.

metrics: Refactoring & Efficiency: Integral migration of core modules to .NET Core, resulting in significant technical debt reduction and notable improvement in corporate portal maintainability.
experience.description: Development and maintenance of the official web portal and architectural refactoring.

education: Higher Technical Degree in Software Development (ISTEA), 2014-2021
